questions.question: The Stamp Act of 1765 was unfair because it taxed all paper products________

choices.answer: while the colonists didn't have representatives
while the colonists didn't know how to write

questions.question: The colonists were unfairly treated. _________, they felt angry.
One day in Boston the colonists started throwing snowballs at the British soldiers ________

choices.answer: As a result, they got shot.
That is why the King increased taxes.

questions.question: One reason the British put a tax on tea is _______.

choices.answer: They dumped the tea into the harbor.
They dressed like Native Americans to dump the tea overboard.

questions.question: The British put a tax on tea. So, _______.

choices.answer: the colonists started revolution right away.

questions.question: The British Parliament closed the Boston harbor to punish the colonists _______.

choices.answer: and for that reason they dumped tea overboard.
as a result, they dumped tea overboard.

questions.question: As a result of the ______________the colonists decided to fight against the British.
During the Boston Massacre 11 unarmed colonists died ______________.

choices.answer: However the British soldiers were not punished.
because the British soldiers were not punished.
So, the British soldiers were not punished.
That is why the British soldiers were not punished.

questions.question: Thomas Jefferson wrote the Declaration of Independence ____________.

choices.answer: As a result, he wanted the colonies to be independent.
because he wanted the colonies to be independent.
because he wanted the British King to rule the colonies.
So, he wanted the colonies to be independent.

questions.question: The Boston Massacre and the Tea Party are ________
